briefing: You have five top priorities today, including testing the Studio C connector after the deployment ID change and creating an updated PRD envisioning HubSpot capabilities. You also need to establish a media ingest and storage SOP, and make progress on the SuperChase approval gates and Scan2Plan CPQ/proposal UI. I will ensure you are uninterrupted as you focus on these tasks.
